definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Where have I read something about dungeons?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪讀過過關於地牢的東西啊？

sentences.english: Instancing - This is a dungeon where you will load into your OWN copy of the dungeon with your group.
sentences.chinese: 這指一個你會和你的隊伍一起載入自己的副本的地牢。

sentences.english: There existed at the Chatelet in Paris a large and long cellar.
sentences.chinese: 從前在巴黎的小沙特雷，有個長長的大地牢。

sentences.english: There must be some like trapdoor or something.
sentences.chinese: 地牢裏一定會有暗門之類的東西。

sentences.english: In the first act the curtain goes up on a dungeon in a landlord's house.
sentences.chinese: 第一幕啓幕時，舞臺上現出了地主家裏的一個地牢。

sentences.english: And this is the dungeon itself. At those times it was full of poisonous snakes and scorpions.
sentences.chinese: 這就是地牢，當時裏面有許多毒蛇和蠍子。

sentences.english: What did you expect, coffins and dungeons and moats ?
sentences.chinese: 你以爲是什麼樣像棺材地牢或者城壕那樣的？

sentences.english: And LeiJinYi was exposed the identity, is locked in military dungeon.
sentences.chinese: 而雷錦儀卻被暴露了身份，關在了軍部的地牢裏。

sentences.english: No ray of light was allowed to penetrate that pestilential dungeon or to warm its icy-coldness.
sentences.chinese: 沒有一絲光線能透進這瘟疫般的地牢，驅散其陰冷。

sentences.english: John had Maude and her son cast into a dungeon.
sentences.chinese: 約翰讓人將莫德和她的兒子關進了地牢。

sentences.english: When the bell rang, he grabbed his bag, and hurried to the dungeon door.
sentences.chinese: 下課鈴一響，他就抓起書包，衝向地牢門口。

sentences.english: They will defend the shelter and explore the dungeons along with the male dwarves.
sentences.chinese: 他們將保衛處，探索地牢隨着男性矮人。

sentences.english: Old medieval dungeons had trapdoors laid underneath stones.
sentences.chinese: 早先中世紀地牢的石頭地面下都有暗門。

sentences.english: When the moat is deep a ladder can be used.
sentences.chinese: 你以爲是什麼樣像棺材地牢或者城壕那樣的？

sentences.english: Yes; the dangerous and mad prisoners are in the dungeons.
sentences.chinese: 有，危險的犯人和發瘋的犯人都在地牢裏。

sentences.english: Survive longer than your average dungeon delver.
sentences.chinese: 比一般的地牢探索者倖存得更久。

definition: prison cell containing water, in which prisoners are forced to be partly immersed
a room for keeping sth hidden/secret room/hidden chamber
lit. nest of devils/place occupied by sinister forces
cage used to hold or transport prisoners
